StatDef.label: Max Lasso Distance
StatDef.description: The maximum distance from which an enemy can be lassoed by this pawn.\nAffected by the equipped lasso type.

StatDef.label: Lasso Cooldown
StatDef.description: The cooldown, measured in seconds, between lasso uses. Affected by lasso type and pawn health status.

StatDef.label: Execution Cooldown
StatDef.description: The cooldown, measured in seconds, between melee executions. Affected by pawn melee skill and other factors.

StatDef.label: Lasso Reel Speed
StatDef.description: The speed of ensnaring and then reeling in an enemy using a lasso.\nHigher values mean that it takes less time to grab and pull the target into melee range.\nThis is NOT the lasso cooldown.

StatDef.label: Execution effectiveness
StatDef.description: The probability that 'execution' animations will be successful: a successful 'execution' will kill or down the enemy, whereas a failed execution will simply wound the enemy.\n\nThis stat is affected by pawn melee skill, weapon, and can also be tweaked in the mod settings.

StatDef.label: Execution lethality
StatDef.description:
The probability that 'execution' animations will kill (rather than down) an enemy.
This only applies when the execution is 'successful': check the Execution Effectiveness stat to see how likely it is that an execution is successful.

This stat is affected by the current melee weapon, as well as melee skill, and can also be tweaked in the mod settings.
